ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] RE: OT: Recommendation for a home firewall
ygData.msgSnippet: Firewalls: Microsoft Operating Systems: Black Ice - http://www.networkice.com Norton s Internet Security - http://www.norton.com or http://www.symantec.com or
ygData.messageBody:
Firewalls:

Microsoft Operating Systems:
Black Ice - http://www.networkice.com
Norton's Internet Security - http://www.norton.com or
http://www.symantec.com or your local computer shop.
Other Firewalls, depends on what you are looking for, try
http://www.yahoo.com and search for 'Firewall Software'

Other Operating Systems:

Linux - check out http://www.linux.org for info.
OS/2 - i know there is one, but forgot what it is
Unix - hundreds available, search http://www.yahoo.com

good luck

MacGrough Mich'Rathe
27th Out-of-tune Bard
Solusek Ro Wanderers
